title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about perfume from a dead person on the authority of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about perfume from the dead: A person wants to use perfumes due to their different attractive scents and the feeling of comfort and refreshment when sprayed, but he can see the deceased giving him perfume in his dream or taking it with him with different details. The vision, then, what is the interpretation of a dream about perfume from the dead? Interpretation of a dream about perfume from the dead by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about perfume from the dead. In the dreamer’s vision there are many things about perfume from the dead, such as giving it to him, taking it from him, or sprinkling it on him, and from here the interpretation takes its meaning according to what entered the dream. If the dreamer receives perfume from the deceased, then there is a lot of happiness that he will be able to achieve, which relates to many different matters, both at work and in relationships. This perfume expresses the fortuneteller’s praiseworthy qualities, his fair dealings among people, his closeness to everyone, and his lack of His arrogance towards anyone, which makes others respect and love him. The perfume bottle indicates many beautiful symbols, especially for a man. If the deceased gives him a sober and expensive bottle, it is expected that this person will soon marry a woman of special beauty and a different personality. And if you find a dead person He asks for this in a dream, so you should always remember him and pray for him constantly, and if you can give alms, do so, given his need for these things. Interpretation of a dream about perfume from death by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains that seeing perfumes in a dream is generally a worthy vision With praise, it expresses the pleasure, joy, and distinguished life that a person lives in those days. It says that the dreamer who cares for the dead and sprinkles perfume on them will have more joy in the future, regardless of the abundance of livelihood he has, God willing. This vision, according to Ibn Sirin, is related to the promotion of a person in his job. Or the marriage of an unmarried girl. If he meets her deceased mother, he sprays her with perfume, and he will be close to her engagement. . Except for the happiness of the mother with her and the goodness she does. The interpretation of this dream for him is characterized as a sign of getting rid of sins and annoying things, so the person will be ready to correct his affairs and remove anxiety from himself while he is awake. In the event that the man feels the difficulty of life and his inability to carry out all the responsibilities that Surrounding him, and seeing the deceased giving him a beautiful perfume with a wonderful smell in his sleep, then he sees comfort, blessing, increase, and coming. From eating from various sources, and God knows best. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of the best dream and vision translators in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. Interpretation of a dream about perfume from death for a single woman: A girl’s needs in her life vary, and desires and aspirations increase with the period of youth. If she sees the deceased offering her perfume in a dream, she will gain a lot of happiness, God willing. If the girl is thinking In marriage and trying to find a partner for her who will bring her happiness and achieve what she wants, and she saw the dream, this gives her good news to complete what she is thinking about. Many interpreters confirm that the smell that she receives

title: Interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dream to learn about their meanings and symbols. In fact, the dream of dogs falls within the list of common and mysterious dreams at the same time, as the viewer does not know whether this dream is Mahmoud’s and indicates goodness or hatred for him and symbolizes a problem for him. Dogs are among the most favorite animals among many, whether Adults or children, who want to have it at home. As for seeing a dog, it has many different interpretations and meanings that differed between men and women, so you can see in the encyclopedia Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of pet dogs.Interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dreamIbn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dream. Ibn Sirin mentioned several interpretations of this vision, In the case of seeing sick pet dogs, this dream is an indication of the dreamer’s illness in reality. Dreaming of pet dogs in a dream indicates kindness and abundance of sustenance, and it also indicates gaining a lot of money, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is walking with a dog in a dream, this vision appears. The love that those around him enjoy. If you eat dog meat in a dream, this vision indicates overcoming enemies in reality. Among the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin in this dream: If you hear a dog barking loudly in a dream, then this vision is undesirable. It indicates the presence of an enemy in reality who seeks to harm him, and if many have heard. Dogs bark, then this vision indicates that he will betray in reality. If the dreamer sees dogs tearing his clothes, then this dream indicates that there are evil people in the dreamer’s life who are on his agenda. Seeing pet dogs in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations of seeing pet dogs in a dream for a single woman differed. . In the event that you see a white pet dog, then this dream indicates the presence of a virtuous person in her life, but if this dog is wild, then this indicates the harm that the person seeks to inflict on her. Among the symbols of seeing white pet dogs in a dream is that it is a sign that she is connected to a person What in reality. If you see a black dog, this dream is a sign of a cunning and deceitful person trying to harm her in reality. Seeing a sick dog in a dream means that there is an evil person in her life who is jealous of her and seeks to harm her. As for seeing a puppy in a dream, in the event that you see a brown puppy, This means the envy and hatred that a person faces from someone in his life. Seeing pet dogs in a dream for a married woman. As for seeing pet dogs in a dream for a married woman, this indicates the intensity of her husband’s love for her. If the married woman sees that she is being kind to the dog and feeding it, then this dream indicates They help the needy in reality. When you hear the sound of dogs barking in a dream, this indicates the presence of an honest person in their life. In the case of riding dogs, this vision indicates that they control their home. Interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dream for a pregnant woman. In general, a dream about a dog symbolizes Dreaming of a pregnant woman to someone

title: Interpretation of seeing a swing in a dream in detail

preview.html: Learn about Muhammad Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a swing in a dream. Dreams are known as a group of visual situations that a person sees during his sleep at night, and although many believe that they stem from a group of repressed inner desires that a person cannot achieve in reality, so he resorts to realizing them in his dreams. However, it has been well proven that dreams carry It contains many symbols and signs that foretell a person of many of his future affairs that may bring him good or warn him against evil. Among the things that seeing it in a dream brings are many (floating) connotations, which we will learn about with you in the following article, explaining seeing it in a dream in detail. By Muhammad Ibn Sirin, so follow us on the encyclopedia website. Seeing a swing in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of swinging in the sky. Muhammad Ibn Shirin pointed out that seeing a swing in a dream is one of the things whose vision comes as a reflection of the reality of the person who lives in it. Seeing it also symbolizes the person’s deep desire for adventure and going to The limits of imagination in which the rules of reality do not bother him, as it indicates the desire to get rid of negative feelings and keep worries away from life, as he can indicate this. The happiness and joy that the visionary feels when he hears the happy news. While seeing falling from a trapeze indicates that the visionary has made some wrong decisions in his life, which often cause him bad things and bad consequences in the end. Interpretation of a dream about floating in the air when he sees In his dream, a man sees a swing moving up and down without anyone sitting on it, then this is a sign that he is going through an unstable psychological period and a state of imbalance. Whereas if he sees that he is sitting in bed and feels happy playing with it, then this vision is a sign of the arrival of happy news in the future. His life and that he is experiencing a period of happiness and prosperity. If the dreamer is single and sees the swing in a place for social occasions, then this is a happy glimpse of his marriage soon, while in his vision the rope of the swing breaks or he falls from it, then this is an image indicating that the dreamer will be exposed to a major shock or a trip above Something soon, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a swing for a single woman: Seeing a swing in the dream of an unmarried person indicates that she is a hasty girl in making important life decisions, and it also shows instability in the circumstances of her life during this period. And when she sees the swing moving without anyone sitting on it This vision is an indication of the need to be careful about the upcoming period of her life, which will be an important pivot that can change the entire course of her life. When a single woman sees herself riding a swing and enjoying it in an amusement park or park, this vision is a sign that positive and happy things will happen. It will happen in her coming days. And if she sees that she is riding a swing with an unknown man that she does not know, then the vision is a sign of her emotional connection soon, and that many in this world will be happy. In the vision of an unmarried woman breaking the rope of the

title: I dreamed that I was teeming with joy

preview.html:
I dreamed that I was jaggery in joy in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com.
Zagruta is a common thing in women that expresses joy and pleasure. They do this on happy occasions such as weddings, returns from trips, births, etc., and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I was brimming with joy. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single. Or married or pregnant. I dreamed that I was happy with Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained seeing a skuk for joy in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer has been exposed to something bad that will cause her sadness, and God knows best. Seeing a skuk in a dream indicates many happy events in the next period of the dreamer’s life. Zaghruta in a dream. It indicates the return of the person the dreamer loves from exile, and God knows best. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing joy in a dream. I dreamed that I was surprised by Ibn Shaheen’s joy. Ibn Shaheen’s explanation: Seeing shouting joy with music in a dream shows that the dreamer will hear bad news in the coming days. Seeing a zigzag in the house in a dream indicates an event. Happy for Simon, who soon brings joy to the people of the house.
Zagruta in a dream in general indicates that the dreamer enjoys vitality and activity and feels hope and happiness. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing distributing an invitation to joy or marriage in a dream. I dreamed that my saliva was dripping with joy for the real Imam. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted the gurgling with joy in a dream. It indicates that God will bless the dreamer with many good things in life. The coming period. Seeing a zigzag for no reason in a dream indicates many worries and concerns in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was happy with the song. Seeing squatters alone in joy in a dream indicates that something bad will happen to her in the coming period, and God knows best. Zaghart in his fiancée’s dream, and this indicates that He will get married soon, and God knows best. Seeing the Zaghari student in a dream shows that she will achieve great success and excel in her professional life. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing Koussa happy in a dream. I dreamed that I was overwhelmed with joy for the sake of a married woman. Seeing a married woman complaining happily in a dream indicates that she is an unfit woman who commits sins. Many bad deeds. Hearing the sound of crying in a married woman’s dream says that there are bad and false words being said about her behind her back. A married woman sees her daughters getting angry in a dream. It indicates the extent of their great love for her and their close relationship of understanding and affection. Sighing in a married woman’s dream in general shows that her children have reached a high position and achieved A great success. I dreamed that I was rejoicing with joy for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman complaining a lot in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees her squealing in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was screaming with joy for a man. Seeing a man groaning with joy in The dream indicates that he was exposed to some problems and crises in his professional life. Hearing a creaking sound in a man’s sleep indicates the emergence of promising things and happiness for him, and God knows best. Read another explanation:

Interpretation of a dream about thick and black hair in a dream and it could be a sign. On the good, and God knows the unseen. When you see long, thick hair, it can be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. If a young man sees long, thick hair, it may be happy news, and God knows the unseen. title: Everything you are looking for in the interpretation of a dream about riding a bicycle or a wheel in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about riding a bicycle or a wheel in a dream: Driving transport in a dream is considered one of the most common visions, especially those visions related to driving dangerous means such as trains, planes, and ships, and each vision has its own meaning. This vision has meanings that vary depending on the personality of the dreamer, and whether he cannot or cannot. Riding, and is it angry or sad, and perhaps we take into account the dreamer's vision of cycling in general. Dream. Interpretation of a dream about riding a bicycle or a wheel in a dream: The wheel symbolizes continuous movement and non-stop, and the belief that movement is better than stillness that leads to inactivity. It also symbolizes the future that the dreamer is looking for and the desire to achieve the ambitions that he planned and drawn up some time ago. The bicycle indicates the striving person And the patient who does not tire and does not tire in following the teachings and walking on the right paths. The path that the person with the vision walks shows his reality. If he is riding a bicycle and walking on an easy and straight path, then it shows the correct approach that he follows in his life, the ease in the matters and actions that he takes and the ability to Overcoming crises. If the road is not paved and has many turns, this indicates the difficulties that he faces in reality and the frequent skirmishes between him and his colleagues, whether at work or study, and the feeling of constant fatigue and fear of falling into the circle. . From failure. The wheel shows a person who is determined to succeed and stays away from failures or disappointments. It also indicates hard work, goal pursuit, tendency to challenge and competitiveness within the project. Driving on the wheel is clear evidence of great ambition and the desire to acquire knowledge and move forward in writing the future And depositing ideas. Riding a bike and walking quickly indicate recklessness in decision-making, failure to listen to others, inability to solve problems correctly, irrational thinking and the desire to achieve everything as quickly as possible. Riding a wheel symbolizes good planning and the first step in overcoming difficulties and getting rid of Of obstacles and the fulfillment of desires. The obstacles that the dreamer faces in his dream while riding a bicycle are the same ones that stand in his way in reality and prevent him from reaching his goal. A motorcycle is different from a bicycle in a dream, as the motorcycle symbolizes the dangers in which the dreamer is immersed and difficulties. The endless quarrels in his life and the many quarrels between him and people, while the bicycle symbolizes the simple man who tends toward calm discussion. He has composure and overcomes what he faces wisely. He is in control and does not want any conflict to occur between him and others. We also find that the motorcycle symbolizes the man who wants to achieve his goals quickly and without any thought, while the bicycle indicates the one who takes steady, calm and gradual steps towards his goals and does not rush fate or reject opportunities, as he plans. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing lice in the hair

preview.html: Many people wonder about the interpretation of the dream of seeing lice in the hair. This vision causes them great anxiety and they seek an explanation for it. This dream carries within it many associations and symbols. Whether it is a single woman, married, pregnant, or a man, lice usually symbolizes the presence of envy and haters. What is the interpretation of the dream of seeing lice in the hair? Through the various website, we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing lice in the hair in the following lines as follows: The interpretation of the dream of seeing lice in the hair is an indication that the dreamer will obtain all the pleasures of the world and will have a lot of sustenance through children and money. Seeing lice in the hair indicates the dreamer’s piety and following all the teachings of religion. If you see lice walking on the body, it is a sign of good offspring and abundant food. Seeing lice coming out of the hair and walking on the body indicates that there are those who talk about everything that is harmful to the dreamer and are trying to distort his reputation as much as possible. Possibility. As for seeing a large number of lice in the hair, this indicates that there are many enemies, but they are weak in heart, so there is no need to worry about them because they are too weak for the fortuneteller to inflict any harm. Seeing lice in the hair and then starting to fall on new clothes is evidence that the dreamer will suffer from A major financial deterioration due to the accumulation of debts and because of these debts he will not be able to live normally as he feels everything. Time is limited. As for the patient who dreams of having lice in his hair but killed them, the dream indicates that he will soon recover from the disease, but if he is unable to kill them, the dream indicates that the disease will continue with him for some time. time. A long time. I dream of lice in my hair by Ibn Sirin. After interpreting the dream of seeing lice in the hair, we interpret Ibn Sirin’s dream of having lice in my hair as follows: The lice in the hair in the dream symbolize that the circle of people that surround the dreamer are mostly enemies and not friends as the dreamer thinks. As for someone who dreams that he pulls lice from his hair and throws them away without killing him. This is evidence that he does not make the right decisions in his life and always feels hesitant and confused about everything new that comes his way. The abundance of lice in a married man’s dream is evidence that the dreamer treats his children well, but if the dreamer feels lice biting him, the dream indicates that he is suffering from Psychological disorders as a result of lice accumulation. Worries. Ibn Sirin’s dream of lice in my hair is an indication that he will be exposed to a serious health problem and this disease will make him lose many important opportunities in his life. I dream of lice in my hair for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a lot of lice in her hair, this indicates that she will be exposed to severe damage from One of her relatives. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is killing lice in her hair, this indicates that she has the courage and strength to face all the difficulties she faces. But a virgin girl who feels lice biting along with her suffering indicates that there is someone trying to discredit her. Among the interpretations he mentioned Commentators say that the inability of an unmarried girl to kill lice suggests that she has been betrayed. An unmarried woman who refuses to marry is in fact...

title: Interpretation of a flood in a dream: Seeing a flood in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the flood symbol for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, whether in the sea to escape the flood, for Imam al-Sadiq, the flood of the house, to escape from Ibn Sirin. Water in a dream is a symbol of prosperity, abundance, and life in general, and its flood is the spread of goodness if it does not exceed its limits. Whoever sees in his dream that a flood or A huge torrent that flooded the city and entered the shops and stores, this is a harbinger of a flood that will invade it. Whoever sees in his dream a red or cloudy torrent, it is a disease or epidemic affecting the people in that place or city. And whoever sees in his dream that a flood or torrent came at a time other than rain, then this is an experiment and heresy that will affect That place. Seeing floods, heavy rain, etc. may indicate good and beneficial rain for people. Seeing floods resulting from hurricanes, torrents, collapsed dams, or strong waves, and seeing that the house has been flooded with water or that part of it has been destroyed, and all of this in the dream indicates a deteriorating situation. Which he is going through, so the internal balance is unstable and the events that you are going through in your life affect you negatively on you and your personality. Whoever sees that a flood entered his house or the homes of his neighbors and destroyed them, uprooted plants and trees, and caused ruin and vandalism, then he is an enemy that attacks them, harms them, and harms them. It was said about the evil of existence. A flood or torrent in a dream means that the enemies have betrayed and attacked them. Whoever sees in his dream heavy rain causing a torrent, it is harmful to him or a disease that will afflict him, and they said that the torrent is a journey for the dreamer. Whoever dreams that a flood or torrent fills the streets, drowning the people inside, uprooting trees and demolishing houses, then people will rejoice and benefit from it, as it is good and beneficial for him. And if he is unable to survive, then this is a warning to him. Seeing people struggling with the flood in a dream means losing or losing hope. When he saw the flood, the place he was in was flooded, and he was able to escape from it, and the vision indicates his salvation and liberation from The hardships that burdened him. Seeing a torrent or flood moving away from the house means that you are fighting an enemy. Whoever sees in his dream that he is trying to keep the torrents and torrents away from his home and protect it, this indicates that he is fighting his enemy, protecting his family, and preventing them from all harm. Whoever sees the Awsil flood coming in the rainy season, he A man disobeys God and does not understand religion. Seeing floods indicates that you are suffering from pressure from others. Whoever dreams that a flood submerged the city and carried with it corpses and blood, then this is a punishment from God falling on this city. Whoever dreams that a flood or torrent overflowed a place and the dreamer swam in it and survived it, He has salvation from the oppression and oppression that would have befallen him, and if he had not escaped from it, he would have been afflicted. Something that the unjust ruler or ruler hates. As for seeing a flood of dull colors and turbidity, it is more dangerous, whether injustice or illness. The dream of a flood remains linked to the context of the dream and the events that the dreamer experiences in waking life. Interpretation of a dream of a flood in a dream. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation of seeing a flood in a dream that it indicates Enemy and betrayal in general, but if one dreams of seeing rain and it is very dangerous for it to turn into a flood in the dream, this means that there is danger and disasters that will occur in the future.

title: Interpretation of seeing traveling to China in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Symbol of China in a dreamSymbols for viewingTraveling to ChinaIn a dream, the dreamer aspires to achieve many successes and his desire to obtain a prestigious position. The vision indicates the dreamer’s love for fun, visiting many countries and exploring their landmarks. The vision in a dream for an unmarried young man promises success, earning a lot of money and living A decent life. The vision also expresses the marriage of an unmarried girl and the trip with her husband, and God knows best. Traveling to China in a dream is for free people. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to China in a dream is that if an unmarried woman sees that she traveled to China and got lost, this is a warning of trouble in the coming period. Seeing a trip to China promises to successfully complete studies, excel this year, and obtain high grades. Seeing Chinese people in a dream indicates that there is strong competition between her and her classmates. As for feeling happy in dealing with Chinese people in a dream, it indicates useful work that you have in addition to meeting New friends. The vision also symbolizes hearing good news and heralds good occasions and upcoming joys. The words of a Chinese young man in a dream mean engagement and marriage after a short time, and God knows best. The vision also portends positive changes in the girl’s life, as her life will be better than before. See a large number of Chinese In a dream, it symbolizes abundance of money and a halal diet. Traveling to China in a dream for a man. Interpretation of going to China for a man is a sign that all his circumstances have changed for the better. Seeing traveling for pleasure in a dream warns of deteriorating health conditions for the person who sees it. If He saw a married woman traveling to China to complete her studies, which proved to be a great success for her family. Seeing an unmarried woman packing her travel bag heralds the approaching wedding date and moving to her new home. Boarding a plane in a dream to travel to China indicates that the dreamer is characterized by logic, good behavior, and wisdom in decision-making. Traveling to China in a dream symbolizes the great status that the dreamer will achieve. Seeing a single person in a dream traveled to China, declaring his superiority and reaching all his desires. Feeling tired when traveling to China in a dream is evidence of the differences and problems that the viewer is exposed to. Seeing Chinese in a dream for a married woman symbolizes seeing the people Chinese: In a married woman’s dream, there are righteous people in her life. The vision also shows that there are people around who help the woman get rid of problems and overcome difficult periods. Seeing a large number of Chinese people in a dream indicates that there is competition at work. The vision also shows that the woman is a beloved person for the family. And friends and neighbors. Interpretation of dreams: Traveling to China: In a woman’s dream with her husband, this means that she lives a comfortable life and achieves what she desires with her husband. The vision also symbolizes the woman’s success in managing her family’s affairs and her desire to raise her children with a good upbringing. Seeing that you do not complete the trip to China in The dream is a warning of the problems that a woman faces with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to...

title: Interpretation of palm trees in a dream Seeing palm trees in a dream

preview.html: A dream about palm trees for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man means either palm trees, or water and dates, small palm trees, fronds, and the emergence of palm trees. Cutting palm trees, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of palm trees in a dream. Seeing palm trees in a dream indicates goodness, happiness, and good skin soon, and this is related to improving the situation from worst to better, and it may indicate the goodness that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing palm trees in a bad and withered condition, may mean that That the fortuneteller suffers from pain and sorrows that he is exposed to in his life, and in some cases this can indicate the success of a person’s trade if he is a trader working in it. Buying and selling. Whoever dreams that he has many palm trees instead of palm trees, he is responsible for people’s affairs for the number of these palm trees, if he is qualified for the matter. Otherwise, he will be affected by a profitable trade or luxurious handicrafts. Whoever sees a cut palm tree, they are honorable. The palm tree is the man of the Arabs, Haseeb Nafi’, Sharif Alam. He is obedient to people. He is from his clan and his trunks are a denial of the Almighty’s saying: “And I will not crucify you on the trunks of palm trees.” Leaves are an increase in children and offspring, and wounding many palm trees is a matter for the ruler, and trade is for the merchant, and the merchant is a profit. Perhaps a single palm means the honorable woman who overflows with kindness and remembrance. The dry palm tree is a demonstrator. And whoever sees that the wind uproots the palm trees, there was And perhaps this was a torment for that city from God Almighty. And dates are money that does not last. Whoever dreams that he has broken a rest, then the matter over which there is a dispute or a hated journey will be completed. And whoever sees a seed that has become a palm, there is a son who becomes a scholar, and there is a humble person who weakens. Some of them said that date trees have a long lifespan. The questioner is the provision of halal, treatment and treatment. Eating in a dream at an inappropriate time is healing, blessing and joy according to the story of Mary, peace be upon her. Interpretation of palm trees in a dream for a man. Seeing dried palm trees in a dream is evidence of hypocrisy and walking in an inappropriate path. As for whoever sees himself removing palm trees from their place, this may indicate This area, where trees are removed, may be exposed. Sickness, epidemic, and God’s wrath have isolation and a solution. In the event that a fortuneteller sees cut palm trees in a dream in the event that he intends to travel, this may mean that this fortuneteller’s journey is not fruitful at all. In the event that a man sees fruitful palm trees, this may mean a long life and good offspring Of children. It can indicate his wife’s pregnancy in the near future and it can indicate fruitful work that benefits the people around him, and if he sees this vision for one person, it can mean marriage. Interpretation of a palm falling in a dream. Palm trees falling in a dream is evidence of a falling palm. An entire country and it can indicate disappointment and failure in life matters. Interpretation of a small dream in a dream Seeing a short palm may indicate that the woman is barren and suffers from glaucoma deficiency, but God will save her for it. Interpretation of palm trees in a dream for a married woman A married woman who sees palm trees In a dream, it indicates good skin, comfort, contentment, and happiness. But if you see a lot of palm trees, this may indicate happiness.
